lead_paragraph: The Constitution (50) was taken out of the dry-dock, at the Navy-Yard, Brooklyn, yesterday morning, and the Macedonian was taken in. The latter ship, formerly a frigate, is to be razeed into a corvette, of two decks, she is to mount twenty eighty four pounder shell guns, on her main deck, and two long pivot guns of twelve inch bore--one forward and one aft-to carry both solid and hollow shot, on her spar-deck.
